long_description: Mini Morph(TM) is small in stature, but big on features--fills both fat and skinny tires with ease and has a convenient fold-out foot pad. Single-action pump has a handy thumb lock to keep pump compacted. Fold-out foot pad provides hassle-free inflation. Fits Presta and Schrader valves. Includes mounting bracket.
short_description: Mini Morph(TM) is small in stature, but big on features--fills both fat and skinny tires with ease and has a convenient fold-out foot pad.
